summary: A cool Sithis themed wallpaper for the Skyrim aficionado.
descriptionHtml:
Bothered by a certain lack of good Sithis-themed wallpapers on the internet, I decided to make one by myself, and the result is the wallpaper uploaded in here.

The size of the file is big because it comes as an uncompressed PNG. The wallpaper's resolution is 1920 x 1080. You can resize it to your own will if you want, or save it as JPG if the size proves to be an inconvenient for you.

I hope you like it.

Also, check out my other wallpapers:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/morrowind/users/8200851/?tb=mods&pUp=1]http://www.nexusmods.com/morrowind/users/8200851/?tb=mods&pUp=1[/url]
author: Bobolinho
